name: PhDivinity
description:
<<   STORY   >>

Welcome to your divinity certificate. Take a seat.

As a deity, your role is to maintain balance in everything. Be successful in the following exercises, and you’ll get your diploma in a glance.

So go ahead, keep this world in balance!

Be careful though, you actions may have impacts that go beyond your will...

<<   GAMEPLAY   >>

Build and destroy buildings to maintain balance, and manage territory spaces.

To succeed you will need to pay attention to 3 core aspects of the world you'll be shaping.

<<   INFO   >>

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Music kindly offered by www.musicincloud.com
